title: UK weather: The latest Met Office forecast
text:
Watch the latest UK weather forecast from the Independent for today.

We'll be updating this page daily with the latest available live video.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

This forecast is supplied to us by the Met Office, which is the national weather service for the UK.

The Met Office provides internationally-renowned weather and climate science and services to support the public, government and businesses.

The organisation makes meteorological predictions across all timescales from weather forecasts to climate change.

For further information and weather predictions, visit the Met Office website.

For more interesting stories about the day’s weather in the UK, visit our UK Weather section here.
